column1: # Lines must have six tokens, undefined tokens must contain hyphen (-)!
# Format: type url path mime parameter class
# Possible types are javascript, css, json and text.
# A relative or absolute url to a web server for javascript and css type.
# Custom field for freely defined value.
# Parameter to use in the injection process.
# json: variable where result from JSON.parse(...) is assigned to. The variable is appended with window. and prepended with = by the injector.
# locale: language files by locales, e.g. en_US, fi_FI, fi_SE
# !x = parameter name for a group, e.g. locales are to be stored in a window.spLocales
# Spaceify's languages. Store locales to window.spLocales. First locale on the list is the default locale.
